defaultMessage: The volunteer tutor signs up and creates their profile.
The student signs up, searches, and requests a tutor.
Parent approves of the requested tutor
Each lesson request must receive parental approval before tutoring can take place.
After parental approval, the tutor and the student both receive an email with a link to their secure, private Bramble room.

description: The title of the "About us" home page section.
The first paragraph of our "About us" description.
defaultMessage: Tutorbook is a free, online tutoring platform that connects students affected by school closures with volunteer tutors.

description: The second paragraph of our "About us" description.
defaultMessage: Our mission is to connect students with expertise through one-on-one mentoring and tutoring. Hereâ€™s how you can help:

description: The first CTA in the "About us" bulleted list.
defaultMessage: Inform every parent and high school student that you know!

description: The second CTA in the "About us" bulleted list.
defaultMessage: Re-post this message and promote us so we can help more students!

description: The third CTA in the "About us" bulleted list.
defaultMessage: Help us recruit more volunteers by following #2 and by signing up here.

description: The title of the "Our mission" home page section.
The first paragraph of the "Our mission" section.
defaultMessage: Students across the globe no longer have individualized support from teachers nor in-person collaboration due to COVID-19.

description: The second paragraph of the "Our mission" section.
defaultMessage: Our vision is for every student to have an expert mentor and (as needed) tutor(s).

description: The third paragraph of the "Our mission" section.
defaultMessage: To do this, we have reached out to university students and educators from around the worldâ€”people who want to make a difference in this time of need.

description: The fourth paragraph of the "Our mission" section.
defaultMessage: As a result of the kindness and generosity of these talented individuals, students now have access to free one-on-one academic mentorship through our platform (and highly talented individuals have a means to make a difference from home ðŸ˜‰).
